mapper.select: select pss.end_time, pss.is_over_day, pss.seq, pss.shift_mins, pss.start_time from pm_shift as ps INNER JOIN pm_shift_sub as pss on ps.id = pss.shift_id where pss.shift_id = #{query.id} and ps.shift_type = '2' and ps.status = 1 and pss.status = 1 order by pss.seq asc

select seq,start_time,end_time,shift_mins,is_over_day from pm_shift_sub as c, (select b.id from department as a , pm_shift as b where a.dep_id = #{pgId} and a.company_id = b.company_id and b.shift_type = "1" ) as d where c.shift_id = d.id and c.status = 1

select seq,start_time,end_time,shift_mins,is_over_day,the_date,day_hours from pm_shift_sub as a, (select shift_id,the_date,day_hours from pm_calendar_sub as b,pm_pg as c where b.calendar_id = c.calendar_id and c.pg_id = #{pgId} and b.the_date BETWEEN #{pmWorkProcedureStartTime} and #{pmWorkProcedureStartTimeMonthLater}) as d where a.shift_id = d.shift_id and a.status = 1 ORDER BY d.the_date asc
